profile.name: Apostolos Gouvalas
profile.bio: Full-stack developer with over {{__YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE__}} years of experience in PHP, SQL, and JavaScript, among other languages. With attention to detail and a passion for problem-solving, I am eager to contribute my skills to dynamic and challenging projects.

entries.name: Eldico B2B
responsibilities: Optimized store integration with SoftOne (merchant program), enhancing overall functionality.

Developed Quick Cart feature using Ajax, allowing real-time inventory control, auto-save for incomplete orders, and an intuitive user experience. The appearance was based on a mockup design provided by the company.
Created processes to meet various company requirements.
Created XML product list generation tool with flexible options for category exceptions, product codes, and manufacturer selection.
As part of the project, developed other company sites: amila.gr, escapesummer.gr, and total-gym.gr.

entries.name: Efthivoulis Cash and Carry - B2B
responsibilities: Integrated the store with their commercial program (SoftOne), using the Lumen microframework.
Developed an automated product image downloader that converts images to .webp format for improved site performance.
Developed a process to download the PDF catalog and display it in a flipbook.
Developed a process for calculating and presenting order volumetrics with Ajax for each product addition/removal from the cart.

Developed of a module for scanning the barcode of a product with the mobile camera and then being able to view the product page or add it to the cart. Vue was used for the appearance and management of the application and the QuaggaJS library was used for scanning.

entries.name: ICPS
responsibilities: Refactored legacy code from PHP 5.6 to PHP 7.4, improving system performance and compatibility.

Replaced outdated image-based Captcha with Google reCaptcha for enhanced security and user experience. Implemented with my own abstract class encapsulating the reCaptcha logic for reuse across various forms on the site.
Replaced Flash elements with modern HTML5 and JavaScript solutions for improved accessibility and performance.

entries.name: Other Clients
responsibilities: Built a solution to read and import product data from supplier files. Imported products into CS-Cart and harvested detailed data (SKU, images, description, features) via Icecat API calls. Created a process to select the cheapest supplier with stock for products offered by multiple suppliers.
Built websites and e-shops using ready-made templates, adapting them to meet customer requirements.
Developed plugins for OpenCart and WordPress to meet various customer requirements.
Cleaned websites, mainly WordPress, after hacks.

entries.name: Company's Projects
responsibilities: Created a module for the presentation, search, and import of books from Biblionet into the company's bookstore (OpenCart).
Developed plugins for WHMCS, such as an evaluation form for different departments and a GDPR agreement management tool for the company and reseller customers.
Developed plugins for Joomla, such as displaying forum threads according to the category and displaying books based on the current category.
Developed plugins for WordPress, such as staff management and display.

description: Lead company projects, creating tailored e-commerce solutions, integrating third-party services, and delivering custom plugins for WHMCS, Laravel, vBulletin, Joomla, and OpenCart.
Develop and maintain e-commerce websites (OpenCart, CS-Cart, PrestaShop, WooCommerce), integrating custom functionalities and ERP systems like SoftOne.
Build and customize dynamic websites for various industries (corporate, personal, portfolios) using WordPress, Joomla, and other CMSs, focusing on client-specific needs and plugin development.
Converted PSD/AI mockups into responsive, pixel-perfect HTML/CSS or WordPress themes, ensuring optimal cross-device/browser performance.
Developed custom websites, e-shops, and web apps, integrating front-end and back-end technologies to meet client needs and improve user experience.
Created and promoted company profiles on Facebook and Twitter.
Created and managed advertising campaigns for the company through Facebook and Google AdWords.
Optimized the speed of the company website using tools such as PageSpeed (Google) and YSlow (based on Yahoo rules). The company website is built with Joomla! CMS.

Developed user interfaces for applications to visualize results from the 2014 Italian European Parliament Elections and display historical election data. Transformed graphic mockups into responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, and jQuery.
Edited content using FlexionPro, the company's proprietary CMS.
Administered online classroom content with Moodle.

entries.name: NPC Generator
desc: Built a form with dynamic and interdependent fields for single-player attribute options for DnD (Dungeons & Dragons).
Created endpoints in Flask to submit the form.

The processing of the form data is handled by a Python script developed by my friend Argyris Tsagkalidis, who also assisted with the Flask setup and form requirements as I have limited knowledge about DnD.

entries.name: Resume App
desc: Built a resume app using modern web technologies such as Vite, React, and TypeScript.
Focused on building a responsive, dynamic design with custom CSS to showcase my professional experience and skills.
Integrated various features like print, PDF download, and an interactive 'expanded view' for displaying additional work and personal project details.

entries.name: Scrabble Word Finder
desc: Developed a word validation and anagram finder tool for Scrabble using Vue.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind.
Implemented IndexedDB to store and retrieve word lists for efficient searching.
Used Python for data preprocessing to prepare word lists and improve search performance.
